statements: DELETE FROM secure_data_transfer_protocols WHERE source_system = 'System A' AND transfer_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM secure_data_transfer_protocols WHERE destination_system = 'System X' AND transfer_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM sensitive_information WHERE user_id = 100 AND data_category = 'Personal' AND secure_connection = TRUE;
DELETE FROM secure_data_transfer_protocols WHERE encryption_key = 'AES256' AND secure_connection = TRUE;
DELETE FROM sensitive_information WHERE user_id = 123 AND data_category = 'Personal' AND data_value LIKE '%SSN%';
DELETE FROM unauthorized_access_logs WHERE action = 'Brute Force Attack';
DELETE FROM data_transfer_logs WHERE data_size > 1000 AND source_system = 'Admin System';
